p: The 21 st century has witnessed the coronavirus epidemic twice before the outbreak of COVID-19. Hence, the findings and learning of SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV could be applied for the COVID-19 epidemic. Healthcare workers who have worked directly with the confirmed patients in the hospitals have the likelihood to suffer from physical and psychological problems. Consequently, it is important to keep them updated regarding the treatment process along with the psychosocial training because precise knowledge reduces the risk of psychological problems. Healthcare workers are also going through a kind of quarantine that can lead to high levels of depression, anxiety, PTS syndrome, in addition to their high occupational stresses. For this reason, the isolation of healthcare workers should also be included in the treatment and training plan.
